relevant_findings.description: Secret communication from Mexico City CIA station, requesting a letter drop for a cryptonym 'CRYSTAL-1'
relevant_findings.direct_quote: C/S COMMENT: REQUESTED MEXI PROVIDE LETTER DROP FOR T)CRYSTAL-1.
relevant_findings.significance: Suggests an active intelligence operation or communication channel in Mexico City, potentially related to surveillance or covert communication

relevant_findings.description: No direct mention of Oswald, but indicates complex intelligence communication networks
relevant_findings.significance: Demonstrates the type of communication channels and coded messaging used by intelligence agencies during the period

relevant_findings.description: Document shows travel plans for Jerzy Plebanski to attend international symposium in Dallas
relevant_findings.direct_quote: JERZY PLEBANSKI GOING DALLAS 15 DEC ATTEND INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON GRAVITATIONAL COLLAPSE AND OTHER TOPICS IN RELATIVITY/ASTROPHYSICS
relevant_findings.significance: Reveals academic travel details, though not directly related to JFK assassination
